distri: Pop songs are well represented in the data set. Looking at the hottness of pop music we can see that it does not seem to well resist the hard fashion's laws. Indeed for songs older than 5 years(before 2010) hottness is below the average value.
Hottness: Looking at intrumentalness we can observe that pop music has a lower rate of instrument in its songs and thus it also means that pop music is more about voice of the singer than just intrument. On this point electronic and pop music are in complete opposition. The other characteristics of pop music to well represent the average behavior.
